To all the idiots that believe that Trump is a waste of candidate, let me ask these questions about Biden. 

What about the trillions that Biden handed out over $8 billion to Ukraine while giving nothing to his own citizens? What about leaving the border open for just ANYONE to come in without the proper legal processes? My own mother, who is Canadian, is trying to become a citizen the correct way and she will likely have to wait years before her application is approved while a dude can simply just hop the fence and instantly live a life here in this country. What about plummeting our economy into the crapper and making it to where daily supplies for living such as groceries, gas, apartment rent, and homes all go up in price? How about the fact that none of you would even have a vaccine to give at all if it wasn’t for Trump expediting it with Operation Warpspeed? What about the fact that Biden also wiped out baby formula from supermarket shelves and shipped crates of it to the southern border while leaving nothing for American mothers? What about Biden putting perverted and pornographic material into school systems that exposes children to material that shouldn’t even be in their minds at such a young age? What about Biden putting laws into place that allow children to make huge decisions about their own medical care and life-altering surgeries that could potentially damage them down the line when they aren’t even aware of who they are or what they want in life yet? What about Biden dragging the US into a war in the middle east? 

Also, and this Biden fuck up is a beauty…. What about when Biden rapidly pulled troops out of Afghanistan with no real organized process and left billions of dollars worth of military hardware and weaponry in the hands of the Taliban?
